===
i18
===


    Apply nlp tasks into some grammar (i.e. html)


Installation from git

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install git+https://github.com/api-market-company/i18.git


.. _pyscaffold-notes:

information on PyScaffold see https://pyscaffold.org/.
